name: PIX-WING
description:
Do you remember playing a certain space based flying game when you were young? I do, and this is how I remember the way it looked.

You'll need a gamepad to play. Left stick is pitch and roll, right stick is yaw. The right shoulder trigger is accelerate, left shoulder trigger is brake. Menu button is restart.

CAN YOU GET THE FASTEST RUN?

Includes Music by Kevin MacLeod:

Feral Chase Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Corruption Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
